abstract: The Texas governor contrasts himself to Mitt Romney in an appearance before social conservatives.
snippet: The Texas governor contrasts himself to Mitt Romney in an appearance before social conservatives.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Perry of Texas sought on Friday to ease concerns of Republican primary voters who have questioned his credentials, highlighting his unwavering support for some red-meat conservative issues: Fighting abortion. Defunding Planned Parenthood. Support for Israel.

headline.main: In Swipe at Romney, Perry Highlights Abortion Stance
